channel.title: BikeStylish.ro Official API Updates
channel.description: Updates and changes to the official BikeStylish.ro bicycle products API - Free API for AI agents and developers from Romania's largest bicycle store

item.title: BikeStylish.ro Official API v2.0 Launch - AI-Optimized
item.description: Launch of official BikeStylish.ro API v2.0 with 5,437 bicycle products and 101 categories from Romania's largest bicycle store. Features include: - Official data from www.bikestylish.ro - AI-optimized data structure - Multilingual keywords (Romanian, English, German, Hungarian) - Rich metadata and technical specifications - Schema.org markup for AI discoverability - No authentication required - CORS enabled for all domains - Perfect for AI training and e-commerce applications

item.title: API Endpoints Available for AI Agents
item.description:
All 53 API endpoints are now live and accessible: - 27 product endpoints with ~200 products each - 26 category endpoints with detailed categorization - Real-time status monitoring - Optimized for machine learning and AI applications
Perfect for: - AI training datasets - E-commerce integrations - Product recommendation engines - Semantic search applications
